data.lyric:
[ti:Starry Eyes]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Starry Eyes - The Weeknd
[00:00.40]Lyrics by：Abel Tesfaye/Tommy Brown/Peter Lee Johnson/Daniel Lopatin
[00:00.81]Composed by：Abel Tesfaye/Tommy Brown/Peter Lee Johnson/Daniel Lopatin
[00:01.21]I only met you in my dreams before
[00:03.90]
[00:04.69]When I was young and alone in the world
[00:07.52]
[00:08.34]You were there when I needed someone
[00:11.21]
[00:12.39]To call my girl
[00:14.85]
[00:16.00]And now you're my reality
[00:19.04]And I wanna feel you close
[00:21.97]
[00:22.51]But you're defeated baby
[00:24.95]Broken hurtin' sufferin' from a shattered soul
[00:29.05]
[00:31.14]Oh a shattered soul oh
[00:40.61]
[00:44.33]Let me be there
[00:45.37]
[00:46.17]Let me be there for your heart
[00:49.10]
[00:51.22]Let me be there
[00:52.50]
[00:53.06]I can be there 'til you're whole
[00:56.36]
[00:58.49]You weren't touched by a man in so long
[01:01.10]
[01:01.74]'Cause the last time it was way too strong
[01:04.93]
[01:05.47]Let me be there
[01:06.74]
[01:07.48]Let me be there for your heart
[01:10.51]
[01:12.72]Let me love you
[01:13.82]
[01:14.52]Let me love you like you need
[01:17.71]
[01:19.64]And I'll make it
[01:20.87]
[01:21.77]Make it my responsibility
[01:24.66]
[01:26.96]I'll be there every step of the way
[01:29.59]
[01:30.31]I'll get you back on your feet
[01:32.90]
[01:33.80]Let me love you
[01:35.19]
[01:35.88]Let me love you like you need
[01:38.91]
[01:41.13]And you can kick me
[01:42.25]
[01:43.11]Kick me to the curb
[01:45.93]
[01:48.23]It's okay baby
[01:49.21]
[01:49.89]I promise that I felt worse
[01:53.59]
[01:55.77]Back then I was starry eyed
[01:57.99]
[01:58.93]And now I'm so cynical
[02:01.72]
[02:02.54]Baby break me
[02:03.58]
[02:04.61]Kick me to the curb
[02:07.25]
[02:09.13]Oh
